oracle text:
12/12

Whenever Cthulu attacks or blocks, target creature defending player controls gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

Whenever Cthulu deals combat damage to a player, that player discards two cards and you draw two cards.

At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player sacrifices a creature.

Eldrazi creatures you control have menace.

*"Ph'nglui mglw'nafh Cthulhu R'lyeh wgah'nagl fhtagn" translation: "In his house at R'lyeh, dead Cthulhu waits dreaming."*
